alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 3:39PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gadsden, northwestern Jefferson and Leon Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 339 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Midway, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midway, Tallahassee, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Miccosukee, Iamonia, Tallahassee Mall, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Governors Square Mall, Belair, Levy Park, Indian Head Acres, Andrew, Chaires Crossroads and Baum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
